name: City Bus Traffic Racing - eXtreme Realistic 3D Bus Driver Simulator Game FREE
name_original: City Bus Traffic Racing - eXtreme Realistic 3D Bus Driver Simulator Game FREE
description:
Prove your bus driving skills. Can you handle tearing through town at high speeds in a large city bus? Dynamic traffic makes each run a serious challenge. How far can you get before having an accident?

Features:
-3 City Buses
-High Quality 3D graphics
-Realistic city environment
